books.title: Learn how to build modern web application with MEAN stack
books.author: Didin J.
books.description: The comprehensive step by step tutorial on how to build MEAN (MongoDB, Express.js, Angular 5 and Node.js) stack web application from scratch.

books.title: Express in Action: Writing, building, and testing Node.js applications
books.author: Evan Hahn
books.description: Express in Action is a carefully designed tutorial that teaches you how to build web applications using Node and Express

books.title: Getting MEAN with Mongo, Express, Angular, and Node
books.author: Simon Holmes
books.description: Getting MEAN teaches you how to develop web applications using the MEAN stack.

books.title: Mastering Web Application Development with Express
books.author: Alexandru Vladutu
books.description: A comprehensive guide to developing production-ready web applications with Express

books.title: Web Development with Node and Express: Leveraging the JavaScript Stack
books.author: Ethan Brown
books.description: Learn how to build dynamic web applications with Express, a key component of the Node/JavaScript development stack

books.title: Express Web Application Development
books.author: Hage Yaapa
books.description: Here's a comprehensive guide to making the most of Express's flexibility in building web applications
